alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:14PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Forest, northern Oconto and eastern Langlade Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation, or 8 miles southwest of Crandon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pearson around 625 PM CDT. Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation and Woodlawn around 630 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
